feed.title: Axel says hi
feed.subtitle: Hello Wiredcraft! This website was made for the DevOps test.

entry.title: Fortune
entry.content:
Dear Emily: I saw a long article that I wish to rebut carefully, what should I do? – Angry

Dear Angry: Include the entire text with your article, and include your comments between the lines. Be sure to post, and not mail, even though your article looks like a reply to the original. Everybody loves to read those long point-by-point debates, especially when they evolve into name-calling and lots of “Is too!” – “Is not!” – “Is too, twizot!” exchanges. – Emily Postnews Answers Your Questions on Netiquette
entry.summary: Dear Emily: I saw a long article that I wish to rebut carefully, what should I do? – Angry

entry.title: Fortune
entry.content: I have a dream. I have a dream that one day, on the red hills of Georgia, the sons of former slaves and the sons of former slaveowners will be able to sit down together at the table of brotherhood. – Martin Luther King, Jr.
entry.summary: I have a dream. I have a dream that one day, on the red hills of Georgia, the sons of former slaves and the sons of former slaveowners will be able to sit down together at the table of brotherhood. – Martin Luther King, Jr.
